evolutionOptions.features: Cogwyn's wings are now embedded with intricate gears and cogs that rotate seamlessly, reflecting his mastery over machinery and constructs. His attire is adorned with mechanical embellishments that pulse with magical energy.

enhancedAbilities.name: Mechanical Overdrive
enhancedAbilities.description: Can cast Animate Objects and Steel Wind Strike through his Song Magic, controlling multiple constructs and performing swift, powerful strikes.

enhancedAbilities.name: Arcane Forge
enhancedAbilities.description: Enhances the partys equipment, allowing for temporary magical enhancements and repairs.

enhancedAbilities.name: Construct Mastery
enhancedAbilities.description: Grants the ability to summon and control powerful magical constructs that assist in combat and exploration.

components.name: Master Gear from the Towers artificer workshop

upgradeRequirements.ritual: Performed in the Towers artificer workshop during a mechanical surge event. The Diver must assemble the Master Gear and infuse it with Arcane Oil while chanting the Gearmaster's Chant, binding mechanical and magical energies to Cogwyn to elevate him to Gearmaster.
upgradeRequirements.failureOutcome: Cogwyn becomes Cogwyn Ascended, gaining enhanced construct control and minor equipment enhancements but without the full mechanical mastery abilities.

evolutionOptions.name: Cogwyn Flux Engineer
evolutionOptions.features: Fluxara's wings feature flowing, energy-infused circuits that pulse with magical currents. Her attire is adorned with dynamic patterns that shift with her inventive creations.

enhancedAbilities.name: Energy Manipulation
enhancedAbilities.description: Grants the ability to manipulate magical energy, enhancing the partys spellcasting and granting resistance to magical damage.

enhancedAbilities.name: Adaptive Constructs
enhancedAbilities.description: Creates versatile magical constructs that can adapt to different combat scenarios, providing both offense and defense.

components.name: Energy Core from the Towers power chamber

upgradeRequirements.ritual: Performed in the Towers power chamber during a magical surge. The Diver must channel the magical essence through the Energy Core while chanting the Flux Engineer's Mantra, infusing Cogwyn with adaptive magical energies to elevate him to Flux Engineer.
upgradeRequirements.failureOutcome: Cogwyn becomes Cogwyn Ascended, gaining enhanced energy manipulation and minor construct versatility but without the full Flux Engineer abilities.

evolutionOptions.features: Cogwyn's wings showcase sturdy, gear-laden structures with intricate mechanical designs that emit a faint hum of magical energy. His attire is reinforced with additional protective plating.

enhancedAbilities.name: Protective Engineering
enhancedAbilities.description: Creates impenetrable barriers around the party, granting immunity to certain damage types and enhancing defenses.

enhancedAbilities.name: Life Infusion

components.name: Master Gear from the Towers ancient machinery

upgradeRequirements.ritual: Performed in the Towers ancient machinery chamber during a life surge event. The Diver must integrate the Master Gear with the Life Essence while chanting the Mechanist's Chant, binding life and mechanical energies to Cogwyn to elevate him to Mechanist.
upgradeRequirements.failureOutcome: Cogwyn becomes Cogwyn Ascended, gaining enhanced protective abilities and minor life infusion powers but without the full Mechanist mastery.

name: Crimsonis

enhancedAbilities.description: Moves undetected, increasing stealth.

enhancedAbilities.description: Deals extra damage when attacking from darkness.

upgradeRequirements.ritual: Performed during the deepest part of the night. The Diver helps Crimsonis attune to nocturnal energies.
upgradeRequirements.failureOutcome: Crimsonis becomes Crimsonis Ascended, gaining minor nocturnal abilities but without full Night Hunter powers.
